nodes.text: Oz Ladnod was a poet to the Royal Court of the planet Onderon whose work was included in Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of writings on the Force edited by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel. Ladnod's work in the collection included a poem on taking action despite external influences.
Oz Ladnod was first mentioned as part of a chapter quote in the 2017 novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka.
